name: Sunday Afternoons Kids Sun Chaser Cap - Youths
categories: Toddler and child hats and toques
description: With its removeable neck cape, this sun cap is ready to be your little one’s UV superhero. It blocks more than 97% of UV and when worn with the cape and provides absolutely excellent coverage.Lightweight nylon dries quickly and wicks away moisture.Breathable mesh allows cooling airflow.Rated at UPF 50+, blocking more than 97% of UV.Removable neck cape easily snaps on or off.Packable design maintains its shape after being stuffed into your beach bag.Adjustable strap sizing fits 5-12 years.Dark under brim panel reduces glare.
